timeline.bodyText: extImpYeahmobi.getZoneId() need to be query escaped
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: They skip injecting if there are any invalid xnative.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
They have different logic in GO.
We need to work with json that in native.request.
  "native": {
          "request": "{\"native\":{}}\"
}

So if there are no imp.native we do not need to do anything.
If there are no imp.native.request JSON NATIVE we need to add this object. You can check their tests to fix our IT tests.
timeline.author: DGarbar
DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: They do not creating several request. They only creating one
timeline.author: DGarbar
DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
In production you'll get  https://{{Host}}/prebid/bidgw-zoneId-bid.yeahtargeter.com
You forget to replace {{Host}}, not just add values.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: just  use return with desirable value
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: changed bc of replacement of host
timeline.author: DGarbar
DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: check Go tests, they have different value in there
timeline.author: DGarbar

replies.bodyText: They have the same value, please look carefully imp.native.request

replies.bodyText: Ok. This example is working for both GO and current implementation.
